overview: Black White & Blue covers race issues in America, police brutality, the Black Lives Matter movement, the Flint Water Crisis, and the 2016 election of President Donald Trump. The film features one-on-one interviews with notable African-Americans: Michigan Senator Coleman Young II, Baltimore attorney William "Billy" Murphy Jr., rapper Killer Mike, former NYPD Officer Michael Dowd and others.

production_companies.name: Top of the Food Chain Films

tagline: Black, White & Blue covers race issues in America like never before with one-on-one interviews featuring notable African-Americans: Charlamagne Tha God, Michigan Senator Coleman Young II, rapper Killer Mike, and others.
title: Black, White & Blue
